method.text: Heat the oil in a large heavy based pan. Add the onion, celery, carrots, garlic and leeks. Gently cook for 2-3 min until just softened but not browned.

Add the tomato puree, lentils, vegetable stock, bay leaf, pepper sauce and seasoning to taste. Bring to the boil then reduce heat to a simmer. Cook for approximately 20 min or until lentils are tender.
Leave to cool a little before pouring carefully into a food processor or blender. Blend the soup until a smooth puree. Then return the soup to a clean pan.
Reheat soup for 1-2 min or until piping hot. Adjust seasoning.
Serve garnished with a spoonful of fromage frais, celery leaves and a final sprinkling of pepper.
